item.title: O
item.description: score:118 Chances: These stocks can diversify your portfolio while setting you up for tremendous dividend income for years to come. For a mere $500, you can buy multiple shares of three stocks with big, safe dividends and long-term rebound potential. Wealthy investors allocate a meaningful percentage of their portfolio to real estate.

item.title: VLY
item.description: score:-167 Chances: Valley National Bancorp has reported an increase in revenue of 1.7% from FY2022 to FY2023. The company has announced a new share repurchase program, indicating confidence in its long-term sustainability. Valley National Bancorp has declared regular preferred and common dividends, demonstrating financial stability and shareholder value.
